医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Ultima 宣布 UG 100™ 并揭示了颠覆性的成本和准确性概况，以实现 100 美元及以上基因组时代今天，该公司还推出了 ppmSeqTM，这是一种颠覆性的新模式，可在调用单核苷酸变异 (SNV) 时实现极高的原始读取准确性。 ppmSeqTM 是一项新的专有功能，由 Ultima 的独特方法实现，通过消除测序工作流程上游引入的样本错误，显着提高调用 SNV 的原始读取准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Ultima-announces-UG-100e284a2-and-reveals-disruptive-cost-and-accuracy-profile-to-enable-the-era-of-the- 24100-基因组-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Ultima-announces-UG-100e284a2-and-reveals-disruptive-cost-and-accuracy-profile-to-enable-the-era-of-the- 24100-基因组-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2591e53-66f5-4a74-91a6-d64e14329ec2 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:54:00 -0500 Ultima announces UG 100™ and reveals disruptive cost and accuracy profile to enable the era of the $100 genome and beyond
研究：抗体组合在晚期癌症患者中显示出安全性和抗肿瘤活性在一项早期临床试验中，针对免疫系统的基于抗体的药物组合在患有各种类型晚期癌症的个体中产生了有希望的安全数据和抗肿瘤活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-Antibody-combination-shows-safety-and-anti-tumor-activity-in-advanced-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-Antibody-combination-shows-safety-and-anti-tumor-activity-in-advanced-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5281c2f9-a2cf-40d7-8523-f63166fbb692 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:50:10 -0500 Study: Antibody combination shows safety and anti-tumor activity in advanced cancer patients
研究人员发现侧支血管在中风恢复中的关键作用交叉连接相邻动脉树的血管调节中风患者大脑的血流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Researchers-uncover-crucial-role-of-collat​​eral-blood-vessels-in-中风-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Researchers-uncover-crucial-role-of-collat​​eral-blood-vessels-in-中风-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba29bafe-f485-4544-ab13-96a44a5a40b4 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:36:00 -0500 Researchers uncover crucial role of collateral blood vessels in stroke recovery
癌症如何影响认知衰退？癌症患者患轻度认知障碍（MCI）和阿尔茨海默病（AD）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/How-does-cancer-impact-cognitive-decay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/How-does-cancer-impact-cognitive-decay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3798979-68c3-4c37-b7b5-4b836c7c084f Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:30:00 -0500 How does cancer impact cognitive decay?
如果您很穷，生育治疗可能遥不可及玛丽·德尔加多的第一次怀孕按计划进行，但七年后当她再次尝试怀孕时，却什么也没发生。 10 个月后，现年 34 岁的德尔加多和她的伴侣华金·罗德里格斯 (Joaquin Rodriguez) 去看了妇产科医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/If-youe28099re-poor-fertility-treatment-can-be-out-of-reach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/If-youe28099re-poor-fertility-treatment-can-be-out-of-reach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39ba79a0-8d0a-47c9-a863-0e2a97fb6584 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:19:19 -0500 If you’re poor, fertility treatment can be out of reach
马镇静剂在人类中的使用以“镇静剂”和芬太尼的致命混合物形式传播小安德鲁·麦克拉夫 (Andrew McClave Jr.) 喜欢举重。这位身高 6 英尺 4 英寸的调酒师酷似健美运动员，曾与前职业摔跤手浩克·霍根 (Hulk Hogan) 合影，展示肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Horse-sedative-use-among- humans-spreads-in-deadly-mixture-of-e28098tranqe28099-and-fentanyl.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Horse-sedative-use-among- humans-spreads-in-deadly-mixture-of-e28098tranqe28099-and-fentanyl.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da928b52-fd29-4165-abc9-5250775cc089 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:18:03 -0500 Horse sedative use among humans spreads in deadly mixture of ‘tranq’ and fentanyl
加州州长纽瑟姆希望选民批准额外数十亿美元的资金来帮助无家可归者。有帮助吗？加州选民将于 3 月 5 日决定是否再投入数十亿美元来应对该国最严重的无家可归危机，民主党州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 认为，这项投资最终将提供数以万计的无家可归者急需的住房和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/California-Gov-Newsom-wants-voters-to-approve-billions-more-to-help-the-homeless-Will-it-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/California-Gov-Newsom-wants-voters-to-approve-billions-more-to-help-the-homeless-Will-it-help.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17c6ccc5-ac32-46cd-b05a-faabb6dc1871 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:15:48 -0500 California Gov. Newsom wants voters to approve billions more to help the homeless. Will it help?
研究揭示多巴胺和血清素在社会行为中的作用在今天（2 月 26 日星期一）《自然人类行为》杂志上的一项研究中，科学家们深入研究了人脑中化学神经调节剂的世界，特别是多巴胺和血清素，以揭示它们在社会行为中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-unveils-role-of-dopamine-and-serotonin-in-social-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-unveils-role-of-dopamine-and-serotonin-in-social-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcd5b9d5-2b44-4ae9-9540-8f70a8c939b8 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:02:58 -0500 Study unveils role of dopamine and serotonin in social behavior
研究揭示新冠病毒可通过血管破坏影响大脑功能多长时间对 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的神经系统反应可能是由于脑-脑屏障 (BBB) 破坏所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-how-long-COVID-can-affect-brain-function-through-angio-disruption.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240226/Study-reveals-how-long-COVID-can-affect-brain-function-through-angio-disruption.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04621edc-6d4e-4b94-98a6-f3670e4d0341 Mon, 26 Feb 2024 05:56:00 -0500 Study reveals how long COVID can affect brain function through vascular disruption
研究揭示了女性在医疗保健领域面临的福祉挑战研究回顾了女性在医疗保健领域的福祉，强调了工作与生活平衡、职业自主权和支持性环境对她们心理健康和工作满意度的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-shines-light-on-the-well-being-challenges-faced-by-women-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-shines-light-on-the-well-being-challenges-faced-by-women-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9ca3cfc-9d21-4a35-a920-43b3641f9752 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 23:02:00 -0500 Study shines light on the well-being challenges faced by women in healthcare
